title: Les Dudek - 1978, 1981 - Ghost Town Parade & Gypsy Ride (FLA

Original Recordings Remastered (2009)
CD Release Date - October 27, 2009 
Total Time - 78:48

(Ghost Town Parade Tracks 1-9)
(Gypsy Ride Tracks 10-19)

Personnel:

Ghost Town Parade:

Gary Mallaber - drums

Gypsy Ride:

Les Dudek - guitars, vocals
Gary Furgison - drums

Clif Newton - rhythm guitar, background vocals
Jerry Knight - background vocals

Mark Stein - piano

From Amazon:

Digitally remastered two-fer from the veteran session guitarist and solo artist containing a pair of albums on one CD: Ghost Town Parade (1978) and Gypsy Ride (1981). Guitarist Dudek has played with the likes of the Allman Brothers, Steve Miller and Boz Scaggs, and yet also found time for a solo career. These were his third and fourth albums. BGO. 2009. 


Ripped by MidnightRocker with EAC V1.0 beta 3, from the factory-pressed CD.
Includes noncompliant wav and flac CUE files and single wav CUE file.
Complete art includes; covers, insert, inlay, disc, o-card (600dpi images handled losslessly then saved as reasonably sized jpgs).
